fairy_sparklers.name: Fairy Sparklers
fairy_sparklers.description: Multi-colored sparklers that are safe for any age.

smoke_bomb.name: Smoke Bomb
smoke_bomb.description: Produces multi-colored smoke and little else

bottle_rocket.name: Bottle Rocket
bottle_rocket.description: Launches into the air with a high pitched whistle, followed by a report

shooting_stars.name: Shooting Stars
shooting_stars.description: Explodes into a fountain of sparkling stars.

big_boom.name: Big Boom
big_boom.description: Makes lots of noise.  Visually unimpressive.

floating_lantern.name: Floating Lantern
floating_lantern.description: Floats in the air when lit, emitting a soft glow

flying_dragon.name: Flying Dragon
flying_dragon.description: Giant flying dragon lighting up the sky

whole_shebang.name: The Whole Shebang
whole_shebang.description: Three-hour-long preprogrammed pyrotechnic display, very impressive!

garage.name: Garage Demolition Kit
garage.description: Enough explosive power to destroy a two-car garage. Excellent for putting in that basement!

backyard.name: Backyard Demo Pack
backyard.description: Need a basement or a pool?  Use this kit to make the space!

tiny_mines.name: Tiny Mines
tiny_mines.description: Kids won't stay off your lawn?  Tiny Mines can help! Not liable for damages, waiver required

small_building.name: Small Building Explosives
small_building.description: Enough to level a small building, up to 3 floors.

large_building.name: Large Building Explosives
large_building.description: Can level a larger building, up to 20 floors.

city_block.name: City Block
city_block.description: Can decimate an entire city block. Must sign waiver.
